voiceAI.title: Voice AI Technology
voiceAI.heroDescription: Experience conversations that feel natural and human. Our voice AI understands context, handles objections, and adapts to each caller's unique needs in real-time.
voiceAI.howItWorks: Our voice AI answers calls instantly with natural-sounding speech. It understands caller intent, responds intelligently to questions, and handles complex conversations without scripts. The AI adapts its tone and approach based on the caller's needs, creating genuinely helpful interactions.
voiceAI.whyItMatters: Traditional IVR systems frustrate callers and lose customers. Voice AI delivers human-quality conversations at scale, ensuring every caller gets immediate, personalized help. This means higher satisfaction, more conversions, and lower support costs.
voiceAI.ctaDescription: Click the orb to start a natural voice conversation

aiReceptionist.title: AI Receptionist
aiReceptionist.heroDescription: Your perfect front desk, powered by AI. Greet callers professionally, route to the right department, schedule appointments, answer FAQs, and take messages‚Äîall with a warm, natural voice that represents your brand flawlessly.
aiReceptionist.howItWorks: When someone calls your business, our AI receptionist answers instantly with a personalized greeting. It understands natural speech, asks qualifying questions, and intelligently routes calls to the right person or department. Appointments are booked directly into your calendar, messages are captured accurately, and FAQs are answered instantly‚Äîall while maintaining a professional, friendly tone that reflects your brand.
aiReceptionist.whyItMatters: Missed calls are missed revenue. Studies show that 80% of callers won't leave a voicemail, and 67% won't listen to voicemails from business contacts. Every missed call is a potential customer choosing your competitor instead. An AI receptionist ensures you never miss an opportunity‚Äîanswering every call instantly, 24/7.
aiReceptionist.ctaButtonText: Talk to Bella, from Nora Hair and Beauty
aiReceptionist.ctaDescription: Bella is trained on a Hair & Beauty Salon, and knows all details on their publicly available website: https://www.fresha.com/lvp/noras-hair-beauty-salon-hennie-alberts-street-alberton-8JyQYL

reviewsAI.title: Reviews AI Assistant
reviewsAI.heroDescription: Turn happy customers into 5-star reviews automatically. Our AI reaches out at the perfect moment, guides customers to Google, Trustpilot, or your preferred platform, and increases your review volume by 10x.
reviewsAI.howItWorks: Our AI detects when a customer has a positive experience, then automatically sends a personalized request to leave a review. The customer is guided through a simple process that takes less than 30 seconds. Negative feedback is routed privately to prevent public complaints.
reviewsAI.whyItMatters: Reviews build credibility and drive SEO rankings. But most businesses struggle to consistently ask for them. Our AI ensures every happy customer is invited to leave a review at the perfect moment‚Äîwhile unhappy customers are given a private channel to share concerns before going public.
reviewsAI.ctaDescription: Click to experience what your customers see when leaving a review

databaseReactivation.title: Database Reactivation
databaseReactivation.heroDescription: Wake up dormant customers and reignite relationships automatically. Our AI reaches out with personalized messages that feel human, re-engaging past customers and bringing them back to your business.
databaseReactivation.howItWorks: Our AI analyzes your customer database, identifies inactive contacts, and sends personalized SMS or email campaigns that spark conversations. It adapts messaging based on customer history, handles replies naturally, and nurtures leads back into your sales funnel‚Äîall on autopilot.
databaseReactivation.whyItMatters: Your database is sitting on untapped revenue. Studies show it costs 5x more to acquire new customers than to retain existing ones. Reactivation campaigns can recover 10-30% of dormant customers, but most businesses lack the time or resources to do it manually. AI makes it effortless and scalable.
databaseReactivation.ctaDescription: Click to start a text conversation with our AI assistant. This model is trained on Robin Banks 'Mind Power Quantum Economics'

documentCollection.title: Document Collection AI
documentCollection.heroDescription: Collect documents, forms, and signatures effortlessly. Our AI guides customers through the submission process, sends reminders, and ensures nothing falls through the cracks‚Äîeliminating manual follow-ups.
documentCollection.howItWorks: Our AI sends personalized requests for documents via SMS or email, guiding recipients step-by-step through the upload process. It automatically follows up with reminders, confirms receipt, and alerts your team when documents arrive. The system integrates with your existing workflows for seamless processing.
documentCollection.whyItMatters: Chasing documents wastes countless hours and delays critical processes. Late submissions cost time and money, while manual follow-ups drain resources. Document Collection AI ensures 90%+ completion rates while freeing your team to focus on higher-value work.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce AI Assistant
ecommerce.heroDescription: Your 24/7 shopping assistant that converts browsers into buyers. Answer product questions, recommend items, handle objections, and guide customers through checkout‚Äîall with natural, helpful conversations.
ecommerce.howItWorks: Our AI engages shoppers in real-time across your website, SMS, and social channels. It understands product inventory, answers detailed questions, suggests complementary items, and overcomes purchase hesitations. When customers abandon carts, the AI follows up with personalized messages to recover sales.
ecommerce.whyItMatters: Over 70% of shopping carts are abandoned, and most shoppers leave with unanswered questions. Live chat agents are expensive and can't scale. E-commerce AI provides instant, personalized support at any volume‚Äîincreasing conversion rates by 20-40% while reducing support costs.
ecommerce.ctaDescription: Chat with our AI shopping assistant

outOfHours.title: Out of Hours AI
outOfHours.heroDescription: Never miss an opportunity, even when you're closed. Our AI handles after-hours inquiries, qualifies leads, books appointments, and ensures urgent matters get immediate attention‚Äîso you wake up to warm leads, not missed opportunities.
outOfHours.howItWorks: When customers reach out after business hours, our AI responds instantly via phone, SMS, or chat. It answers FAQs, captures lead information, schedules appointments for the next available time, and escalates urgent matters to on-call staff. Everything syncs to your CRM automatically.
outOfHours.whyItMatters: Customers don't wait for business hours‚Äîthey choose whoever responds first. Studies show 78% of customers buy from the first responder. Out of Hours AI ensures you're always first, capturing leads that would otherwise go to competitors while your team sleeps.
outOfHours.ctaDescription: See how AI handles late-night inquiries

speedToLead.title: Speed to Lead AI
speedToLead.heroDescription: Strike while the iron is hot. Our AI contacts new leads within seconds of inquiry, qualifying them instantly and booking appointments before competitors even know they exist‚Äîturning speed into your competitive advantage.
speedToLead.howItWorks: The moment a lead comes in from your website, ads, or any source, our AI instantly reaches out via SMS or call. It qualifies the lead with smart questions, answers their initial questions, and books them directly into your calendar‚Äîall within 60 seconds of their first inquiry.
speedToLead.whyItMatters: Response time is everything. Leads contacted within 5 minutes are 100x more likely to convert than those contacted after 30 minutes. Yet most businesses take hours or days to respond. Speed to Lead AI ensures you're always first, dramatically increasing conversion rates and ROI on marketing spend.

fireSafety.heroSubtitle:
At AWE2M8 we are hyper focused on listening to your business challenges. We're single minded in trying to help you increase revenue, reduce costs, and streamline your operations... basically introducing efficiencies whether we can. We do this through business process optimisation with the help of AI, Voice and Text.

As an example by leveraging automation, we could automate all your compliance follow-ups, book inspections 24/7, and turn your old, cold client database into predictable recurring revenue.
fireSafety.quickSmsDemoDescription: See how AI could reactivate clients due for renewals. Have a play. Try break it or ask it complex questions. At this initial stage the AI is only trained on a minimal set of your data, and is general in it's 'assigned task'- which is to book renewals into appointments.
fireSafety.quickChatAIDescription: Chat with our compliance virtual assistant- trained on all your data, knows your calendar, and is able to schedule appointments based on your availability. He never sleeps, never takes leave, and is on the end of the phone 24/7/365.
fireSafety.solution1Description: Your existing client database is sitting on massive recurring revenue. Every client needs annual AFSS statements, 6-month extinguisher checks, and routine testing. Our AI automatically reaches out via SMS when renewals are due, qualifies clients, handles objections, and books inspections directly into your calendar‚Äîturning compliance obligations into scheduled revenue.
fireSafety.solution2Title: Never Miss An Urgent Compliance Call
fireSafety.solution2Description: Fire safety inquiries are urgent and time-sensitive. When clients call about mandatory compliance, overdue inspections, or emergency testing, they need answers immediately‚Äînot voicemail. Our AI receptionist answers 24/7, answers FAQs about AS3745-2010 and AS1851 standards, provides pricing and books service consultations while your team focuses on inspections.
fireSafety.solution3Description: Stop chasing clients for previous reports, equipment photos, or required forms. Our AI persistently follows up via SMS to collect necessary documentation for AFSS submissions, Occupation Certificates, and compliance reports‚Äîsaving your admin team hours of manual follow-up and ensuring nothing falls through the cracks.

solar.solution1Description1: Automatically reconnect with homeowners who inquired about solar but didn't proceed. Our AI reaches out at the perfect time when energy prices spike or government rebates become available.

solar.solution3Description2: Track every lead from initial contact through installation. AI updates lead stages, adds notes, and triggers follow-ups at optimal times.
solar.solution3Description3: Monitor conversion rates, response times, and ROI. See exactly how AI automation impacts your bottom line with detailed reporting.
solar.whyItMatters: The solar industry moves fast, and homeowners have questions 24/7. Our AI automation ensures you never miss an opportunity, whether it's reactivating a past inquiry, responding to a midnight website form, or following up with installation customers about battery upgrades. Everything stays organized and your team focuses on consultations and installations while AI handles the repetitive engagement work.

rayWhiteUpperNorthShore.howItWorks: Our technology reviews your CRM database (or simple CSV) and identifies past clients who haven't been contacted recently. Perfect Timing: AI identifies life events and timing signals to reach out at the right moment.

Scalable Personal Touch: Maintain relationships at scale across thousands of contacts.

Measurable ROI: Most agents see 3-8% of their database respond positively, resulting in multiple new listings per month with zero ad spend.
